test.name: testpmd_txonly_tso
test.objective: Test dpdk-testpmd performance in Tx only mode with TSO

results.notes: testpmd patches to support TSO are not accepted upstream yet and require respin

result.verdict: testpmd does not support '--txonly-tso-mss' option
